tool_description: Verifies delivery confirmations and digital signatures, ensuring proper proof of delivery and identifying potential delivery discrepancies.

signature_data.description: Digital signature data or signature image reference

error_messages: Invalid tracking number: Tracking number format is not recognized.
Missing signature data: Signature data is required for verification.
Invalid timestamp format: Delivery timestamp must be in ISO 8601 format.
Signature verification failed: Digital signature could not be verified or is invalid.
Delivery discrepancy: Delivery details do not match expected recipient or address.
usage: Provide tracking number, signature data, and delivery timestamp to verify proof of delivery. Include recipient name and address for enhanced verification.

proof_of_delivery_score.description: Confidence score for proof of delivery (0-100)
